We do not collect any information as you use Scorpion.

Your login, password, name, timetables, grades and any other information will only be stored locally on your smartphone.

It is your responsibility to ensure the security of this information. You can delete the data from the application at any time in the settings of your smartphone.
I agree to the Terms an Conditions
